item.title: Americano
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml Campari
  • 45 ml sweet vermouth
  • 45 ml soda water
  • (garnish) orange slice

Instructions

  1. Build in rocks glass over ice.
  2. Garnish with orange slice.

item.title: Boulevardier
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml bourbon or rye whisky
  • 15 ml Campari
  • 15 ml sweet vermouth
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Jasmine
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml gin
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml Campari
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a lemon twist.

item.title: Negroni
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml gin
  • 30 ml Campari
  • 30 ml sweet vermouth
  • (garnish) slice orange

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in rocks glass over ice.
  3. Garnish with orange slice.
